title: Supported Platforms
subtitle: Interact with your Repo Agent through your favorite communication tools

telegram.name: Telegram
telegram.description: Powerful bot integration with command support and interactive menus.

feishu.name: Feishu / Lark
feishu.description: Seamlessly integrate into your enterprise workflow.

qq.name: QQ
qq.description: Interact with your Agent on the most popular social platform.

otherSubtitle: We are constantly expanding our supported platforms. If you don't see what you need, here are two ways to get it:

discuss.title: Request on Discussions
discuss.description: Submit a feature request in our GitHub Discussions. We prioritize platforms based on community demand.

skill.title: Encapsulate as Skill
skill.description: ShipMyAgent is highly extensible. You can implement any platform logic and encapsulate it as a custom Skill.
